context: Transferring <a0_0><b4_0>GameCube<b4_0/><a0_0/> development to the <a2_0>Wii<a2_0/> was relatively simple, since the Wii was being created to be compatible with the GameCube.[o] <a3_0><b6_0>At <a1_0><b5_0>E3 2005<b6_0/><b5_0/><a3_0/><a1_0/>, Nintendo released a small number of <b8_0>Nintendo DS game cards<b8_0/> containing a preview trailer for Twilight Princess.
